name: ~Wishin' On Finley~
description:
Wishin' on Finley is a short humorous game where you, the player, yell at a magical talking fish to turn you into a mermaid.

Basic Controls=

WASD keys to move

Enter key to interact with objects and/or advance dialogue

A very simple and quick game I made for a gamejam .  It was very fun and I'm excited to make more complicated things in the future with Bitsy!
